did.abstract: Fraternity for undergraduate students at the University of Michigan; financial records.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was the gift of the fraternity (donor no. 1153)

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Phi Delta Theta Fraternity. Michigan Alpha Chapter (University of Michigan) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Phi Delta Theta is a fraternity for undergraduate students. The Michigan Alpha Chapter of the fraternity was established in 1864 and re-established in 1887.

scopecontent.p: The record group consists of various financial records (ledgers, cash books, etc.) and one roll book. There are also yearbooks from the national fraternity entitled The Scroll of Phi Delta Theta..
